alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Dukes; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 3:02AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...One half foot to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.4 to 12.1 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Barnstable MA, Dukes MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
